attributes.action: Do not provide free vet care for people who are on Housing Benefit, if they purchase a Pet whilst they are receiving this benefit
attributes.additional_details: We call upon the government to in their austerity program abolish free vet care for members of the public who purchase a pet whilst receiving a state benefit of sorts, however in doing so ensure that people who have a pet before they begin to receive state benefit still receive this free care.

rejection.details: Free vetinary care ios provided by charaties
